column3: drake the clock that youve been watching has been stopping he makes you wait what kind of man does that to a girl he wants if you just give tonight to me i promise my hands will say they'll say   drake less than a minute take your clothes off we about to start no false alarm even though the traffic downtown dont show no mercy oh oh think about the last time i came through had something more than a gift for you and i ain't only fuck you like that on your birthday oh oh baby i just landed 'bout to get my bags in all i needs an address and im on my way dont fall asleep yes i see you calling me promise its worth waiting for because im on my way   james fauntleroy won't hurt it's just some turbulence we're dropping dont be afraid if you fall right here in love with me in my bed i'll keep you safe so safe   drake less than a minute take your clothes off we about to start no false alarm even though the traffic downtown dont show no mercy oh oh think about the last time i came through had something more than a gift for you and i ain't only fuck you like that on your birthday oh oh baby i just landed 'bout to get my bags in all i needs an address and im on my way dont fall asleep yes i see you calling me promise its worth waiting for because im on my way   james fauntleroy ahh ohhh i'm on my way ahh ohhh i'm on my way ahh ohhh i'm on my way ahh ohhh i'm on my way
